quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Jerry Dunn

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Your only limit is you.
author: Unknown

quote: Sweat is fat crying.
author: Unknown

quote: Stronger than yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: Train insane or remain the same.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: Make your body the sexiest outfit you own.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wish for it. Work for it.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is no accident.
author: Pelé

quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn’t happen.
author: Unknown

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill
important: The time will never be just right

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown
important: You have to go out and get it

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
author: Philippians 4:13

quote: Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit?
author: 1 Corinthians 6:19

quote: Run in such a way as to get the prize.
author: 1 Corinthians 9:24

quote: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
author: Joshua 1:9

quote: Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us.
author: Hebrews 12:1

quote: The Lord is my strength and my shield.
author: Psalm 28:7

quote: For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power, love, and self-control.
author: 2 Timothy 1:7
important: spirit not of fear but of power

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Luke 16:10

quote: I press on toward the goal to win the prize for which God has called me heavenward in Christ Jesus.
author: Philippians 3:14

quote: Do everything in love.
author: 1 Corinthians 16:14

quote: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.
author: Proverbs 16:3

quote: Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
author: 1 Peter 5:7

quote: Be strong and take heart, all you who hope in the Lord.
author: Psalm 31:24

quote: Those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
author: Isaiah 40:31

quote: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord.
author: Colossians 3:23
important: work at it with all your heart

quote: Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
author: Romans 12:2

quote: The joy of the Lord is your strength.
author: Nehemiah 8:10

quote: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest.
author: Galatians 6:9

quote: Do not be afraid, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.
author: Isaiah 41:10

quote: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you.
author: John 14:27

quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy, One Piece

quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku, Dragon Ball Z

quote: When you give up, your dreams die with you.
author: Uchiha Itachi, Naruto

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s why we grow stronger through hardship.
author: Kakashi Hatake, Naruto

quote: If you run from your fears, your body will never become strong.
author: Roronoa Zoro, One Piece

quote: The moment you think of giving up, remember why you started.
author: All Might, My Hero Academia

quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day.
author: Brook, One Piece

quote: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster; it’s the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki, Naruto

quote: You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that’s where you’ll find the things more important than what you want.
author: Kakashi Hatake, Naruto
important: more important than what you want

quote: A lesson can only be learned through hard work and persistence.
author: Rock Lee, Naruto

quote: A lesson can only be learned through sweat and determination.
author: Rock Lee, Naruto

quote: The body grows stronger when you push past your limits.
author: Goku, Dragon Ball Z

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Koro Sensei, Assassination Classroom

quote: If you want to get stronger, you have to be willing to endure pain.
author: Might Guy, Naruto

quote: No one can grow stronger without facing their fears.
author: Roronoa Zoro, One Piece

quote: Discipline is what transforms dreams into reality.
author: All Might, My Hero Academia

quote: Victory is reserved for those willing to pay its price.
author: Vegeta, Dragon Ball Z

quote: Strength is earned, not given.
author: Kenshin Himura, Rurouni Kenshin

quote: Don’t fear failure. Fear being in the same place next year as you are today.
author: Erza Scarlet, Fairy Tail
important: Fear being in the same place

quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
author: Goku, Dragon Ball Z

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: He who is brave is free.
author: Seneca

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
author: Zeno of Citium

quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
author: Seneca

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
author: Epictetus
important: do what you have to do

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: He who is brave is free.
author: Seneca

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
author: Zeno of Citium

quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
author: Seneca

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
author: Epictetus
important: do what you have to do

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Ancient Proverb

quote: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
author: James Allen

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it’s not the same river and he’s not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: A strong body makes the mind strong.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
important: strong body makes the mind strong

quote: Without struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass
